name: Manuel Felipe de Tovar
text: Manuel Felipe de Tovar (1 January 1803, in Caracas – 21 February 1866, in Paris) was the president of Venezuela from 1859–1861.[1][2] Manuel Felipe de Tovar was married to Encarnación Rivas Pacheco,[citation needed] who served as First Lady of Venezuela from 1859–1861.[citation needed] Encarnación Rivas Pacheco
